effect.black_white: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.black_2_white_2: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

short_effect.black_white: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.

flavor_text.black_white: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.
